Welcome to Borys Online

December 12, 2025
Borys

Welcome to Borys Online

This is the new home of Borys Online, now powered by Astro! Here you’ll find a curated collection of applications and insightful blog posts about development and technology.

What’s New

We’ve rebuilt the platform with a modern tech stack to bring you:

  • Applications Catalog: A growing collection of useful applications and tools
  • Blog: In-depth articles and insights about software development
  • Fast Performance: Built with Astro for optimal speed and user experience
  • Easy Navigation: Intuitive interface for browsing apps and reading posts

What to Expect

We add new applications regularly, so check back often for the latest releases. Our blog covers topics ranging from web development to best practices in software engineering.

Stay tuned for more updates!
